title: Presidential Commission appointed to probe Ruhuna University student’s death
content: Source of News: Ada Derana A Presidential Commission has been appointed to inquire into the details that led to the death of Susantha Anura Bandara, a student of the Ruhuna University, states the Secretary to the Commission Edmund Jayasuriya. The Commission is headed by Supreme Court judge D.J. de S. Balapatabendi. It will probe into…
